Pre-Game Insights: The Kansas City Royals host the Minnesota Twins to open a three-game series.
The Twins hold a 7-3 advantage in the season series.
The Royals have a strong home record and perform well when they get at least eight hits.
The Twins have a strong overall record but a weaker road performance, especially when not hitting many home runs.
Others: The article mentions key players for both teams, including Bobby Witt Jr. and Carlos Santana.
It provides information on recent performance stats for both teams.
